resource: 1002277.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002277.derived=false 1002277.vtc=true 1002277.description=Comprehensive Warranty (from date of purchase). This warranty covers any repair or replacement of components which fail under normal use due to a defect in materials or workmanship. Warranty coverage differs in AL, FL, GA, NC & SC. Please see your local Toyota dealer in those states for further details. (Program not available in Hawaii.)
